channel.title: Bank, trade and shop - (x) instead of "close window"
channel.description:
How am i supposed to change this "Close Window" interface on the bank, trading and shop interface to this "X" button down there? [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/5fjllk.jpg[/img] Someone give me a very very EASY guide/tutorial and i'd be very happy.
My server & client base is: Ben 2012, Another version of Iclarity v1.05.

item.title: Bank, trade and shop - (x) instead of "close window"
item.dc:creator: @masterkorv12 masterkorv12
item.description:
@masterkorv12 wrote:

How? =O, how am i supposed to add a “close window” button in the interface editor? It looks more of text than a button in the case, it matters on my server. I need it, it’s a old-school server with all of those features on old Runescape.

Read full topic
item.source: Bank, trade and shop - (x) instead of "close window"

item.title: Bank, trade and shop - (x) instead of "close window"
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

Remake the interface with Lin’s interface maker, or open the interface in Peter’s interface editor.

Read full topic
